subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|[[蒞]], [[涖]]}} ''({{w|Variant Chinese character|Variant}} {{w|Traditional Chinese characters|traditional forms}} of <big>莅</big> in mainland China)''

subSections.title: Glyph origin
Usage notes
subSections.text:
* In mainland China, {{l|zh|蒞}} and {{l|zh|涖}} are considered as {{w|Variant Chinese characters|variant forms}} of <big>莅</big> which is used as the orthodox form.
* In Taiwan, {{l|zh|蒞}} is considered as the orthodox form while {{l|zh|涖}} is a variant form of {{l|zh|蒞}}. This character, <big>莅</big> is a rarely encountered character ({{l|zh|生僻字}}) in modern Taiwan.
